name: Picking Sticks
description:
Picking Sticks is my first game in which you play as a block of wood and pick sticks up.

Screenshots

How To Play:

  • You can move around the map using the "WASD" keys.
  • Collide with the sticks or press the "Left Mouse Button" to collect the sticks.
  • When you have picked up at least 10 sticks you can press the "Right Mouse Button" to re-spawn the sticks.
  • Each time you re-spawn the sticks, an extra stick is added to the batch.

- Disclaimer - This is not meant to be played. I am just learning what it takes to complete a game and upload it.
